xml.song:
Armor-clad Faith!
Noise fills the burning sky They struggle to testify Justice brings more corpses A disappointing verdict torches They smile for their last stand It cuts through something so bland Every single breath you take is a COUNT. DOWN. TO. YOUR. DEATH.
Nirvana
Discord presides In Society Your Society Vantage - Creeps into Society - Your society
I'm a fool I know nothing I may sound like a silly clown But I won't turn my back on life One day, all will rot away (But) All. I. Do. Is. Embrace, the, wounded, soul!
Armor-clad Faith! Cruel Inequality (Paves way for our future) A black and grey system Always dressed to impress People drown in delusion Without reaching out for truth (With) thorned shield in the hand the troops MARCH TO OPPRESS THE YOUTH! Nirvana Discord - Presides In society - Your society Vantege - Creeps into Society - Your society I'm a fool, I know nothing I take the role of a silly clown But I won't turn my back on life One day, all will rot away (But) All. I. Do. Is. Embrace, the, wounded, soul! Discord - Presides In society - Your society Vantage - Creeps into Society - Your society I'm a fool, I know nothing I take the role of a silly clown But I won't turn my back on life I'm a fool, maybe I'm worthless But this world created my faith So all I can do is stay hopeful and pray
